articles.title: Central Election Committee Reports on Kim Jong Un's Election as Deputy to SPA
articles.content:
Central Election Committee Reports on Kim Jong Un's Election as Deputy to SPA 
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was successfully held in the DPRK.
					 The Central Election Committee on Monday released a report on the results of the election of the deputies to the SPA held at Paektusan Constituency No. 111 on Sunday.
					
					 According to the report, all the voters of the constituency took part in voting and 100 percent of them voted for Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, reflecting the unanimous will and desire of the service personnel and people across the country.
					
					 This is an expression of all the service personnel and people's absolute support and profound trust in supreme leader Kim Jong Un as they single-mindedly remain loyal to him, holding him in high esteem as the monolithic center of unity and leadership and a striking demonstration of their revolutionary spirit and indomitable will to make a fresh shining history of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The DPRK is ushering in the era of great surge in building a thriving socialist nation under the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He set it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, providing a firm organizational and ideological guarantee for developing the WPK into the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He, at the same time, opened a new chapter of the cause of immortalizing the leaders with loyalty and sense of moral obligation, developing the DPRK into the socialist country of Juche which is shining with the idea and the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He set forth a clear-cut strategy for the Korean revolution to be held fast to for all ages so that the country may advance straight along the road to independence, Songun and socialism under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, providing an ever-victorious treasured sword for the prosperity and development of the DPRK.
					
					 He put forward the Korean People's Army as a reliable scout party and a strong mainstay for the Songun revolution by developing and enriching Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics and further bolstered it up as elite revolutionary armed forces. He thus remarkably increased the defense power of the country, firmly protecting the destiny of the socialist country and its people.
					
					 He made a new legendary history of love for the people and love for the rising generations with his noble patriotic politics and all-embracing politics, bringing into full bloom the happiness of the great socialist family in which all its members have blood relations with their leader. 
					
					 He has energetically led the servicepersons and the people to bring about a turning phase in building the economy and improving the people's living standard through a strong wind of Kim Jong Il's patriotism across the country and their patriotic enthusiasm. As a result, the country witnessed steady great successes showing the appearance of a thriving nation.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un's leadership, the DPRK will as ever prosper as the glorious state of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun, is sure to win a final victory.
					
					 The Central Election Committee reports that Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was elected deputy to SPA according to the results of the voting confirmed and submitted by the above-mentioned constituency.

articles.title: Death Anniversary of Kim Il Observed
articles.content:
Death Anniversary of Kim Il Observed
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service took place at the Central Youth Hall on Monday on the occasion of the 30th death anniversary of Kim Il, a revolutionary martyr.
					 Born in a poor farmer family, Kim Il took part in the revolutionary struggle in his early years.
					
					 True to the revolutionary line of Juche put forward by President Kim Il Sung, he devoted himself to the work of the underground party and anti-Japanese mass organization, joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and acted as a political worker, making a positive contribution to the historic victory in the anti-Japanese war. 
					
					 Holding responsible posts of vice-minister of National Defence, military member of the Front Command and chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) after the liberation of the country and during the Fatherland Liberation War, he devotedly worked for building the regular armed forces, strengthening and developing the party and wining a victory in the war.
					
					 Working as vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, first vice-premier of the Cabinet, premier of the Administration Council and first vice-president of the DPRK, he made a great contribution to strengthening the unity and cohesion of the party and revolutionary ranks and laying the foundations of the self-supporting national economy in the period of socialist revolution and socialist construction.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Phyong Hae, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, meritorious people, bereaved families and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, in his memorial address said that the whole life of Kim Il was the brilliant life of a revolutionary soldier who dedicated his all to the struggle for the victory of the cause of socialism, holding in high esteem the leader who pioneered the revolutionary cause and his successor generation after generation.
					
					 He said that the persevering revolutionary spirit and militant work style displayed by him in implementing the party's lines and policies serve as a good example to be followed by everybody in the struggle for materializing the far-sighted plan of the party for building a thriving socialist nation as early as possible.
					
					 He called upon all party members, service personnel of the People's Army and people to become human fortresses and shields holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem with revolutionary faith and obligation and protecting the headquarters of the revolution at the cost of their lives by earnestly learning from the intense loyalty to the party and leader shown by the revolutionary forerunners.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Revolutionary Martyr Kim Il
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Revolutionary Martyr Kim Il
						
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of revolutionary martyr Kim Il in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Monday on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of his demise. 
					 Seen standing before the bust was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, commissions and national institutions, service personnel, bereaved family members and citizens. 
					
					 Wreaths were laid before the bust in the name of the C.C., WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet. 
					
					 Also laid before the bust were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, commissions, national institutions, party and power bodies in the city. 
					
					 The participants made a silent tribute to Kim Il, who was boundlessly loyal to the party and the leader and devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and freedom and happiness of the people with the transparent revolutionary outlook on the leader till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Russian Roving Ambassador Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Roving Ambassador Leaves 
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Grigorii Logvinov, roving ambassador of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia, left here for home on Monday.
					 During his visit he met with officials of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and exchanged views on the issues of mutual concern including the development of bilateral relations and the regional situation.

articles.title: DPRK Friendship Visiting Group Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship Visiting Group Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- A friendship visiting group of the State General Bureau of Tourism of the DPRK headed by Vice-Director-General Jo Song Gol left here on Monday for China.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Polling Stations in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Polling Stations in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Nigerian, Mongolian, UK and Indonesian embassies here and foreigners from China, Norway, Sweden, Italy and other countries staying here visited polling stations in Pyongyang for the election of the deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 They were deeply moved to see voters voting for candidates to deputies, full of enthusiasm to consolidate as firm as a rock the DPRK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They talked with candidates.
					
					 After the visit, they said they came to have a correct understanding of the election system in the DPRK.
					
					 They noted they deeply admired the DPRK where ordinary people such as workers, farmers and intellectuals can be deputies discussing the state affairs.
					
					 They stressed that the election system in the DPRK is very advantageous as it enables the people to express their will freely.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Evil Empire
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Evil Empire
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is the worst human rights abuser in the world which has neither qualification nor face to talk about the human rights issue, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The nearly 70 year-long history of the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea is a crime-woven history characterized by aggression, war, killing, plunder and human rights abuses.
					
					 Washington's hostile moves against the DPRK are a blatant challenge to the independent right of the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, far from drawing a lesson from their shameful defeat in the past Korean war, have made the whole gamut of armed provocations in the sky, land and sea, constantly straining the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Notably, they have massively introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea and staged nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK, gravely threatening peace on the Korean peninsula and the people.
					
					 Now Washington is escalating tensions, terming the regular military drills of the DPRK "provocation" and "threat". It is even making politically-motivated provocations, taking issue with the latter over its nuclear issue and "human rights" issue.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK chose the most advantageous socialist system and have protected it at the cost of their lives. The U.S. is working hard to stamp it out and establish corrupted U.S.-style "democracy" in the whole Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Korean nation and the world progressives will always remember the U.S. heinous human rights abuses and certainly punish it on behalf of history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Assistant Secretary of State Meddling in Issue of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Assistant Secretary of State Meddling in Issue of Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- At a hearing of the U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee on Mar. 5, the U.S. assistant secretary of state let loose a string of nonsensical sophism that the DPRK is resorting to "the reconciliation-war double-dealing tactics" and trying to wrest concessions. He went the lengths of blustering that south Korea started humanitarian activities with north Korea but it is "hard to expect" their progress unless "north Korea dismantles its nukes and missiles."
					 His remarks are an undisguised indication that the U.S. does not want the mending of the inter-Korean relations and a sort of pressure on the south Korean authorities not to opt for cooperation with the north in haste, says Rodong Sinmun in a commentary on Monday.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts to do harm to the DPRK, lay hurdles in the way of mending the inter-Korean ties and escalate tensions.
					
					 How low-minded and base the U.S. is!
					
					 The U.S. is impertinently meddling in the internal affairs of others.
					
					 Recently, the U.S. let Bush, as good as a living dead, who earned an ill fame as a political gangster during his office and is now suffering from dementia, fan up the confrontation between the north and the south, and the assistant secretary threw a wet blanket over the issue of inter-Korean relations.
					
					 But the facts reveals that the U.S. feels uneasy about the vigorous advance of the DPRK and the ever-mounting atmosphere of the Korean nation for independent reunification.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop at once meddling in the internal affairs of others and refrain from doing things harmful to mending the inter-Korean ties.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Decries U.S. for Talking about "Provocations"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Decries U.S. for Talking about "Provocations"
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Now the U.S. is letting its henchmen term the rocket-launching drills of the DPRK a "provocation" and "threats". This is a nonsensical and shameless act just like a thief crying "stop thief".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is perpetrating grave provocations and threats but finding fault with the DPRK over its self-defensive acts. This goes to prove that the U.S. is narrow-minded, suffers from megalomania and has a wrong way of thinking. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to clearly realize what the DPRK is like. 
					
					 The DPRK has the most revolutionary and brave service personnel and people who most value their leader, idea, social system, country and dignity and unhesitatingly devote their lives to protecting them. 
					
					 No force can frighten the service personnel and people of the DPRK who have the iron faith, convinced of the validity of their cause, suffering from grim ordeals and ceaseless threats of war. 
					
					 The U.S. tries to meet its interests by escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula and maliciously slandering the DPRK only to lose its face. If then, it will be impossible for the U.S. to talk about "provocation".

articles.title: Japan's Intention to Abandon Three Principles of Arms Export under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Intention to Abandon Three Principles of Arms Export under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government is going to advance new guidelines allowing arms export in March, according to a recent Kyodo report.
					 If the new guidelines related to arms export come into force, this will pave the way for Japan's massive sale of weapons and equipment to any country and regions of the world for the sake of its political interests.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The main purpose of abandoning the "three principles of arms export" is to regain the position of a leader of Asia at any cost by turning Japan into a military power as early as possible.
					
					 Aware of importance of putting major sea routes under its control, in case a war breaks out to emerge a leader of Asia, Japan seeks to increase its military presence and role by massively selling weapons to the regions and countries concerned.
					
					 Another aim sought by Japan is to create a favorable climate for turning it into a military giant and drastically bolster the military capability of the "Self-Defence Forces" by tightening collaboration, exchange and cooperation with world munitions complexes.
					
					 It is not hard to guess what Japan will do after emerging a military giant and gaining the right to fight a war.
					
					 The international community should heighten vigilance against Japan's militarist veer to the Right and should not allow it under any circumstances.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should resolutely break with this dangerous aggressive idea and its war policy, bearing deep in mind that militarism only brings the final doom to Japan.

articles.title: First Round of Premier Soccer League Matches Starts
articles.content:
First Round of Premier Soccer League Matches Starts
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The first round of the premier soccer league matches has begun Monday as part of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games. 
					 15 men's soccer teams and 14 women's teams are competing in league matches which will run from March 10 till late in April. 
					
					 Men's soccer matches between the Sports Team of the Ministry of Light Industry and Ryongaksan Team, between Rimyongsu Team and Pyongyang Team and between April 25 Team and Sobaeksu Team took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium and women's soccer matches between Chongchongang Team and Amnokgang Team and between Wolmido Team and Ponghwasan Team took place in the playground of the Wolmido Sports Team on Monday.

articles.title: Promising Taekwon-Do Player of DPRK
articles.content:
Promising Taekwon-Do Player of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Hak of the North Hwanghae Provincial Taekwon-Do Team in the DPRK is the world champion in the sparring event of Taekwon-Do.
					 Kim, now 20, defeated all his rivals in the men's 50kg category individual sparring at the 18th World Taekwon-Do Championships last year. He also took the title in the class-A men's 51kg category individual sparring of the 10th World Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championships in Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 He began to learn playing Taekwon-Do when he was in the second year of secondary school.
					
					 Three years after joining in the system of training reserve players, he won in a national Taekwon-Do contest and then became world champion in the juvenile group in six years.
					
					 His rapid development has aroused admiration from among the experts. His forte is quick movement, strong fist strike and footwork of high technique.
					
					 The DPRK awarded the title of Merited Athlete to him for having honored the country with gold medals.

articles.title: Scientific, Intensive Farming in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific, Intensive Farming in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Bigger efforts have been directed to a drive for putting the farming on a scientific and intensive basis in the DPRK after the recent national conference of agricultural sub-workteam leaders.
					 A creative relationship is being strengthened among agricultural guidance bodies, research institutes and production units, and the system of control over the scientific farming further improved.
					
					 Detailed works were organized to ensure the correctness of crop growth forecast and place the activities of the guidance organs and the production units on a sci-tech basis.
					
					 In particular, co-op farms in the city of Pyongyang have striven to raise the cropland utility rate.
					
					 The City Rural Economy Committee took such practical measures as the introduction of advanced methods for culture of seedlings whereby to raise healthy seedlings in less seedbeds. And a work is being conducted to remodel rice-transplanting machines in keeping with the extensive introduction of humus-potted seedlings.
					
					 Meanwhile, farms in west coastal flat areas and intermediary and mountainous areas strive to introduce advanced farming technologies and methods suitable to their geographical characteristics as well as to the biological features of crops.
					
					 Those in South and North Hwanghae provinces have hastened the work to supplement phosphorus and potassium components and microelements while stepping up the preparations for double-cropping.
					
					 South Phyongan Province concentrates efforts on laying out seedling beds, ensuring sowing of wheat and barley in a qualitative way.

articles.title: Women's Rights Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Women's Rights Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Actions demanding the guarantee of women's rights took place in various parts of Seoul on March 8, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 Members of more than 200 civic organizations including the south Korean federation of women's organizations held meetings at Chonggye Plaza and issued a declaration of women demanding the guarantee of democratic rights and equal society.
					
					 Members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting before Posin Pavilion at which they denounced the authorities' job policy for women.
					
					 Members of the Women's Solidarity of south Korea held a meeting at the Seoul Railway Station plaza in protest against the authorities' discrimination against women.

articles.title: Reminiscences of Kim Il Sung Off Press in Brazil
articles.content:
Reminiscences of Kim Il Sung Off Press in Brazil
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century," reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, was brought out in Brazil.
					 Its releasing ceremony took place in Brasilia on Feb. 25.

articles.title: Serbian Political Party Blasts U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Serbian Political Party Blasts U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia in a statement condemned the U.S.-south Korea military exercises on Mar. 3.
					 The statement accused the U.S. and south Korea of staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression despite a strong protest by the Koreans and the peace-loving people of the world.
					
					 Terming these exercises nuclear war drills which involve huge forces, the statement went on:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle chilled the climate for improving the north-south relations and laid a stumbling block in the way of ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Looking back on history, the U.S. is the worst criminal state which has disturbed democracy, peace and security and caused national splits and pursued racial discrimination in various parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists divided Korea into two parts and provoked the Korean War in 1950. They made no scruple of perpetrating invasion of other countries.
					
					 It is the only way of ensuring peace on the peninsula for the U.S. to immediately discontinue joint military exercises against the DPRK and withdraw nuclear war hardware from south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party firmly believes that the Korean people will resolutely foil the U.S. imperialists' maneuvers to stifle the DPRK and win a shining victory in their struggle to defend socialism under the steersmanship of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It will also fully support the Korean people in their struggle against imperialism.
					
					 The New Yugoslav Communist Party calls upon all peace-loving people of the world to extend full support to the measures taken by the DPRK to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country from the moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Brazilian Political Party Leader Praises Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences
articles.content:
Brazilian Political Party Leader Praises Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences 
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Part 1 of The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, was brought out in Brazil.
					 Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" is a valuable legacy as it tells about the undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed by dedicating all his life to the liberation of the country and happiness of its people. 
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said this in a speech at its releasing ceremony on Feb. 25.
					
					 It is our great pride and honor to have published them, she said, and went on: 
					
					 Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years to liberate Korea and victoriously led the building of a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War, post-war rehabilitation and socialist construction.
					
					 He was not only a great master of leadership who turned the DPRK into a socialist industrialized country in a short period and developed it into an independent, self-reliant and self-defensive power but also a great revolutionary and an outstanding leader of the world revolution who devoted his all to Korea's reunification and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un elegido como diputado a la APS, informa el Comite Electoral Central
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un elegido como diputado a la APS, informa el Comite Electoral Central
 Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Concluyeron con exito las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 El Comite Electoral Central informo el dia 10 el resultado de las elecciones que tuvieron lugar el dia 9 en la Circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan.
					
					 Segun la informacion, todos los electores de esa circunscripcion acudieron a las urnas y votaron en 100% a favor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, reflejando la unanime voluntad y deseo de los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes de todo el pais. 
					
					 Este hecho es una expresion de apoyo absoluto y confianza de todos los militares y civiles decididos a apoyar con fidelidad al Mariscal teniendolo como unico centro de unidad y direccion.
					
					 Igualmente, demuestra el temperamento revolucionario y voluntad indoblegable de ellos que bajo la guia del Mariscal, escriben la nueva historia de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Hoy dia, la RPDC abre el periodo de gran auge en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista bajo la destacada y probada orientacion del Mariscal. 
					
					 Al presentar la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo  como maximo programa del PTC, el preparo la garantia ideologica y organizativa para fortalecer el PTC como gloriosa organizacion de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Dando pruebas de su noble fidelidad y obligacion moral, escribio la nueva pagina de la causa de eternidad del lider, de modo que la RPDC se hiciera la patria socialista de tipo jucheano que brilla con la idea y nombres de los Generalisimos. 
					
					 Aclaro la estrategia eterna de la revolucion coreana para que esta avanzara directamente por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo bajo la bandera del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y preparo asi el remedio que viabiliza lograr siempre la prosperidad de la RPDC.
					
					 Al profundizar la estrategia y tacticas kimilsungistas-kimjongilistas, presento el EPC como fidedigna patrulla y punto de sosten de la revolucion del Songun, lo fortalecio como fuerzas revolucionarias de flor y nata y defendio con firmeza el destino de la patria socialista y el pueblo al consolidar por todos los medios el poderio defensivo del pais.
					
					 Al escribir la nueva historia de amor al pueblo y a las generaciones venideras con su noble politica popular y la otra abarcadora, el Mariscal abundo la felicidad de la gran familia socialista que mantiene el mismo linaje con su dirigente.
					
					 Hizo reinar en todo el pais el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y dirigio energicamente a los militares y habitantes para que abrieran con la fuerza de patriotismo una fase de viraje en la construccion economica y el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					
					 De esa manera, permitio lograr uno tras otro los exitos alentadores que perfilan el Estado prospero que se propone construir el pueblo coreano. 
					
					 Gracias al Mariscal, la RPDC prosperara en lo adelante tambien como glorioso Estado de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y se lograra sin falta la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun. 
					
					 Segun el resultado de votacion, confirmado y presentado por el comite electoral de la Circunscripcion 111 de Paektusan, el Comite Electoral Central informo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fue elegido como diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema.

articles.title: Acto central por 30o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Il
articles.content:
Acto central por 30o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Il
 Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 30o aniversario del fallecimiento del martir revolucionario Kim Il. 
					 Kim Il, nacido en una pobre familia campesina, emprendio temprano la lucha revolucionaria. 
					
					 En acato a la autoctona linea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung, se entrego a las labores de las organizaciones partidistas clandestinas y de las entidades de masas antijaponesas. Despues de ingresarse al Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea, se formo como funcionario politico y contribuyo a lograr la victoria historica de la guerra antijaponesa. 
					
					 Despues de liberada la patria y en el tiempo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, ocupo los importantes cargos como viceministro de Defensa Nacional, comisario militar de la Comandancia del Frente y presidente del Comite del Partido en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur e hizo abnegados esfuerzos por la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares, el fortalecimiento del partido y la victoria en la guerra. 
					
					 En los tiempos de la revolucion y construccion socialistas, trabajo como vicepresidente del CC del PTC, primer vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, premier  del Consejo de Administracion y primer vicepresidente de la Republica e hizo gran aporte a consolidar la unidad monolitica del partido y las filas revolucionarias y asentar la base de la economia nacional independiente. 
					
					 En el acto participaron Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los benemeritos, los familiares del difunto y trabajadores capitalinos.  
					
					 Al hacer uso de la palabra de la ocasion, el miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, dijo que toda la vida de Kim Il fue una vida brillante del combatiente revolucionario que apoyo generacion tras generacion al lider allanador de la causa revolucionaria y a su sucesor e hizo todo lo posible por el triunfo de la causa socialista. 
					
					 El indoblegable espiritu revolucionario y la manera de trabajo de caracter combativo, manifestados por el en la materializacion de las lineas y politicas del partido, sirven hoy de excelente modelo para todos los que luchan por realizar con antelacion el gran proyecto del partido sobre la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, ratifico. 
					
					 Apunto que todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes deben apoyar con la conviccion revolucionaria y obligacion moral al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y defender a riesgo de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion aprendiendo la absoluta fidelidad de los martires revolucionarios al partido y al lider.

articles.title: EE.UU. es estado criminal y violador de DDHH, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. es estado criminal y violador de DDHH, subraya Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual divulgado el dia 10, el diario Rodong Sinmun insiste en que Estados Unidos es un estado criminal y violador de los derechos humanos que no tiene calificacion de hablar de DDHH.
					 La ocupacion del Sur de Corea de casi 70 anos por el imperialismo norteamericano es la historia criminal llena de agresion, guerra, asesinato, saqueo y violacion de DDHH, subraya el articulo y continua:
					
					 Las maniobras hostiles anti-RPDC de EE.UU. son el avieso desafio a los derechos soberanos del pueblo coreano.
					
					 El imperialismo yanqui ha venido agudizando constantemente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana librando las provocaciones armadas en el cielo, la tierra y el mar de Corea, en vez de sacar lecciones en la derrota en la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					 Sobre todo, al introducir en el Sur de Corea gran cantidad de armas nucleares, desarrollo freneticamente los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de agresion a la RPDC, amenazando asi rigurosamente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la vida del pueblo coreano.
					
					 En estos dias, calificando los rutinarios ejercicios militares de la RPDC de "provocacion" y "amenaza", exacerba el estado de tension. Tambien, desafia politicamente a la RPDC cuestionando el problema nuclear y el de "DDHH".
					
					 A fin de aplastar el regimen socialista mas ventajoso centrado en las masas populares, optado por el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y considerado como su vida, el imperio trata de insuflar la corrompida "democracia" al estilo norteamericano en toda la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 La nacion coreana y la humanidad progresista del mundo, al saldar cuenta del crimen de violacion de DDHH de EE.UU., lo sentenciaran sin falta en nombre de la historia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena el rumor de "provocacion" circulado por EE.UU. y sus satelites
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena el rumor de "provocacion" circulado por EE.UU. y sus satelites
 Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Junto con sus satelites, Estados Unidos arma escandalo ahora con el reciente entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea describiendolo como "provocacion" y "amenaza".
					 En un comentario individual divulgado este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de acto verbal imprudente y cinico que invierte la verdad de lo ocurrido, y prosigue:
					
					 Si bien comete sin vacilacion alguna graves actos de provocacion y amenaza, el muy cinico imperio cuestiona caso por caso todas las acciones de autodefensa de la RPDC partiendo de su erroneo modo de pensar.
					
					 EE.UU. debe conocer mejor a su rival, la RPDC.
					
					 La RPDC es el pais donde viven los militares y habitantes mas revolucionarios y valientes que aprecian a su lider, idea, regimen, patria y su dignidad y estan dispuestos a ofrendar la vida para ellos.
					
					 No hay en este mundo el que pueda asustar al ejercito y pueblo coreanos que en medio de las duras pruebas y constante amenaza de guerra, adquirieron la conviccion mas firme de la justeza de su causa.
					
					 EE.UU. pasara mas penas si sigue tratando de sacar provechos de la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y de la difamacion a la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ridiculiza interferencia del asistente de secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ridiculiza interferencia del asistente de secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la audiencia del Comite de Relaciones Exteriores del Senado, abierta el pasado dia 5, el asistente del secretario de Estado de EE.UU. dijo unas palabras absurdas, tales como "el Norte de Corea utiliza tacticas de zanahoria y garrote" y  trata obtener alguna concesion. Prosiguio que si bien el Sur de Corea inicia con el Norte de Corea las actividades humanitarias, es "dificil esperar" el avance de ellas si el "Norte de Corea no renuncia a sus armas nucleares y misiles".
					 Sus dichos significan la senal abierta de que EE.UU. no desea la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, siendo una forma de presion indirecta a las autoridades surcoreanas para que no cooperen a la ligera con el Norte de Corea.
					
					 Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 10 y continua:
					
					 EE.UU. hace todo lo posible por impedir la mejora de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y exacerbar la tension calumniando a la RPDC con insistencias absurdas.
					
					 Ayer fomento la confrontacion intercoreana el ex presidente Bush quien se gano la mala fama de gangster politico durante su mandato y ahora  interviene en el problema de relaciones N-S el asistente del secretario de Estado.
					
					 El hecho deja conocer que EE.UU. se siente muy inquietado ante el avance de la RPDC y la creciente determinacion de la nacion coreana de reunificar el pais de manera independiente.
					
					 EE.UU. debe abstenerse de las acciones que puedan impedir la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas.
